dt-api.name: state()
dt-api.summary: Get / set the state of the table

type.description: Get the state of the DataTables
Set the state of the DataTables
type.parameter: A state object that will restore a given state. Note that not all parameters for the state object are required.
Disregard checks for the timestamp for when the state object was created (`true`).

example.title: Get the saved page length from the state object
Get the table state, change it and load it back
